ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Wiz spires/ring in Tox question
ygData.msgSnippet: Is the tooth no-drop? How does one get it? luv, -Su ... need ... last ... will ... I ... to ... http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/ ...
ygData.messageBody:
Is the tooth no-drop? How does one get it?
luv,
-Su

> The "key" is for the velious ports. Its a tooth looking thing and you
need
> it to port to certain places there. I think the Cobalt Scar one is the
last
> one and allows you to port to any of them. So if you get that one you
will
> only need the one "key"/tooth.
>
> Mu
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 05, 2001 8:03 AM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Wiz spires/ring in Tox question
>
>
>
> Cool! Thanks!
> One more thing, do I need any items to self port? I heard someone saying
> they needed a "key" or something to port.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > No they do not. However there are quite a few roaming NPC's in Tox
> forest.
> > Some are still blue to 56 (one is an Enchanter). So after you get there
I
> > would invis myself.
> >
> > Mu
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, July 03, 2001 5:43 PM
> > To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> > Subject: [EverQuest] Wiz spires/ring in Tox question
> >
> >
> > Do the wiz spires/ring in Tox have Erudite guards? Bc, I'm a DE and KOS
to
> > erudites. I just got my tox gate spell and dont' want to go without
> knowing
> > if I'll be attacked immediately upon porting.
> > Thanks.
> > luv,
> > -Su
